benefitsReview: lamictal stabilized my serious mood swings one minute was clawing up the walls in pure mania the next curled up in fetal position on my bed contemplating suicdie am no longer at the whim of my moods and neither are those around me am lucky that started pharmaceuticals almost immediately after was diagnosed bipolar lamictal gives me amazing clarity to go about my day honestly assess myself and form real relationships lamitcal lifted fog guess you could call it now that am medicated realize how cloudy my thought processes used to be it is wonderful feeling interestingly hardly dreamt before beginning lamictal would dream mean dream in the sense of being able to imagine pictures and scenes while asleep not rem maybe once every two months now dream every night found that the closer take it to bedtime the more frequent and more intense my dreams
sideEffectsReview: drowsiness bit of mental numbness if you take too much you will feel sedated since you have to be able to clearly and honestly assess your emotions and thoughts determining how much medication you need is tough found that mg works perfectly for me but that is high dose less than that and can feel the medicine wearing off prematurely like it to last hrs from sleep to sleep more than that and feel numb some might call it drowsiness but it is more sluggishness of the mind for me before began treating my bipolar disorder used to write fair amount of fiction it sort of flowed from me definitely had the artist is temperament after lamictal though that inherent creativity fizzled out it does not come spilling out of me while am deep into manic euphoria have to work at art now it is something that requires discipline if you are in field which requires creativity expect to see change in your output
commentsReview: severe mood swings between hypomania and depression with suicide ideation before lamictal began with mg and tritrated up to mg over few months played around with the dosage to finally arrive at mg experimented with taking it at different times in the evening found that most comfortable time is before sleep

benefitsReview: initial benefits were comparable to the brand name version of this drug depakote had been taking depakote for several months and experienced great results when went to my psychiatrist for an evaluation and re fill he accidently prescribed the generic version depakene when discovered the error was told by this doctor that would experience the same results as depakote the positive side effects of the depakene balanced mood improved concentration improved logical cognition mental clarity lessened anxiety and irritability improved sleep increase in pleasure about activities
sideEffectsReview: depakene has very thin coating which caused severe heart burn and stomach upset the discomfort was so unpleasant that it made me not want to take my meds so was not taking them consistently as prescribed this caused my mood to fluctuate again even after switched to the depakote my stomach was still uncomfortable for several weeks afterwards my appetite decreased and food was very unappetizing certain foods that normally enjoy such as chicken or fish made me feel extremely queasy when ate them did not like the physical side effect of the drug and decided to quit my psychiatric drugs altogether because was no longer stable anymore
commentsReview: depakote was prescribed to me by kaiser psychiatrist in pleasant hill ca in the medication was given to help treat the diagnosis of bipolar disorder type ii my disease was misdiagnosed for several years as depression since was never seen by professional during hypomanic episodes and when did see professional did not think that my manic symptoms were signs of serious psychiatric problem anti depressant drugs were prescribed prozac in which had minimal effect and stopped taking them few months later wellbutrin was prescribed again for chronic depression in the spring of but this medication slowly spun me into an intense manic period after the manic episode fell very hard into severe suicidal depressive state was voluntarily admitted to psychiatric ward in june to keep me safe and to properly diagnose my condition the symptoms was experiencing before being prescribed the depakote depakene rapidly cycling mood swings between intense activation and irritablity excitement and crashing lows and depression suicidal thoughts poor logic and decision making racing thoughts anxiety poor concentration and poor sleep

benefitsReview: it controlls my mood swings it helps me think before act or speak it controlls amxiety it freed me to live my life happily cared about my life more everything had more meaning to me lived very dull life before taking prozac
sideEffectsReview: i didnt really notice any side effects
commentsReview: this drug may not be for everyone but its wonderful for me it makes me totally different person better person

benefitsReview: i immediately stopped having panic attacks it really was miraculous as they were becoming more and more frequent and severe on the combination of klonopin and prozac have not experienced panic attack in years simply feel normal and am able to go through my days without any feelings of extreme nausea or dizziness which is how my panic attacks manifested themselves no longer did have to leave work early avoid restaurants and supermarkets or worry about getting suddenly sick for no reason

commentsReview: after diagnosed with tachycardia prescribed metoprolol tartrate at varying doses over course of few months lowest dose possible was not high enough to keep heart rate low and next highest dose possible was too high e produced extreme shortness of breath tight and heavy chest dizziness on the positive side the medicine did slow heart rate and reduced episodes of extremely high heart rate next prescribed metoprolol succinate with similar benefits and side effects on both meds side effects were too severe to function day to day so was put on atenolol and it has worked for me much better heart rate is held at safe rate and is more consistent than when on the metoprolol symptoms of dizziness heavy chestedness etc are still present but highly diminished can at least perform normal daily functions now now have additional symptoms of vertigo after elevator rides indigestion constipation and short term memory loss but nothing that can not function with recently doctors suggested catheter ablation as they discovered source of my problems to be the presence of extra electrical pathways in my heart

benefitsReview: after suffering spinal cord injury in resulting in quadriplegia c c complete experienced disassociated pain that was concentrated in my right thumb the problem got increasingly worse over the following years ended up having to take lot of ibuprofen and vicodin just to relieve the pain announce to allow me to get some work done however the resulting side effects caused me to sleep lot it also lead to depression was finally given prescription for gabapentin to try out it started working almost immediately after about two weeks was rarely having the pain in my thumb anymore it does not cause me to get sleepy or feel drugged like the vicodin so have been able to work and concentrate on things once again it also seems to have helped with my depression although that may have more to do with not having to deal with the pain or the side effects of the pain relievers was taking before
sideEffectsReview: i have noticed very little side effects at all was told it may affect the effectiveness of other pain relievers but so far have not noticed that when needed to take vicodin when my thumb did still hurt on occasion have on rare occasions noticed some dizziness although am not sure can attribute that to the drug have low blood pressure because of my spinal cord injury that can sometimes cause that to happen as well
commentsReview: i take the medication three times day as prescribed drinking at least cup of water with each dose was originally taking smaller dose of the gabapentin but after about six months my thumb pain started to become more frequent again however my doctor prescribe me higher dose and that helped do still have problems with the pain from time to time but not at all like used to all in all the drug has made huge difference in my life thus far

benefitsReview: i have my life back that is the main treatment benefit suffered from impulsive behaviors probably the most harmful dangerous of them being binge eating and bulimia since taking lamictal at mg for months now my eating habits have become completely normal have not purged in months this is amazing would binge eat and purge because of anxiety now feel like normal person not obsessed with food eat when am hungry stop when satiated have lost lot of weight pounds in months without dieting counting calories etc nothing was wrong with my metabolism it was the impulsive eating stealing food from others throwing it up which gave me high not just to get rid of the calories but it calmed me love the lamictal for this because it is not like some meds that make you lose weight by destroying the appetite am just normal person now also quit the lexapro as it was triggering hypomanic episodes the lamictal is stabilizing my moods it does not numb the depression like the ssris have been on feel things am clear headed but am able to step back and not be hurt by every look get from people am not paranoid anymore can wake up in the morning with energy and fall asleep within minutes of hitting the pillow get sleepy at pm am not hyper and can sit still for more than minutes all good for me this is the right medication for me
sideEffectsReview: loss of weight but this was just result of my mood stabilization as had developed serious eating disorders

sideEffectsReview: i have always been one to freak out at the slightest appearance of illness have anxiety as well as bipolar disorder when was told that lamotrigine the first drug have been on for bipolar caused potentially fatal rash decided that this time was going to try not to worry one out of ten people experience rash on the drug and tried to be rational that means am likely to be one of the nine that does not oh was ever wrong firstly the lamotrigine did not help with moods wanted to die for two days more badly than ever had in my life on this drug it was excruciating luckily have lot of support and obviously did not kill myself could not sleep lay awake most nights until am eventually passed out and got maybe hours of sleep this is barely better than the sleep get when am hypomanic and we all know how bad it is when bipolar people do not sleep luckily the meds did seem to keep me from going upwards mood wise also had to pee all the time which was not fun that brings me to the rash first noticed few raised bumps on my inner forearms thought it would go away that should not freak out was not going to get the rash right and the next morning was covered in slightly raised red rash even on my face and hands went to the clinic and the doctor said was having an allergic reaction he told me to just go home and stop taking the lamotrigine he knew nothing about it or the fact that it causes rashes it got worse and by night time was freaked out called nurse and she told me to go to the emergency room did and they had me stay the night to make sure did not have steven johnson syndrome luckily do not just have something called drug eruption even if it is not going to kill me it is never fun being covered in red blotches still am and it is been three days am afraid to go to the starbucks around the corner my verdict lamictal is not worth it do not risk it
commentsReview: i was put on mg then mg and we were going to keep raising the dose slowly to minimize risk

benefitsReview: strattera helped my son slow down without making him groggy or taking away from his personality
sideEffectsReview: my son became little whiney in the evening when the medication started to wear off
commentsReview: i have always known that my son had adhd evan as baby started looking into medication last year my son was in st grade and had already been suspended from school times he also was in the principals office at least times week he was not able to sit still or focus and was having trouble making friends because of his temper my husband was against medication but talked him into non stimulant we tried intuniv first but that dropped his blood pressure to dangerous level then we found strattera our miracle drug within week we noticed huge difference my sons outburst of rage had completely stopped this year he hasnt been to the principals office once and his grades are mostly is with few is he has also become very popular this year and is invited to almost every birthday party cant tell you how hard it is to see every child in the class invited to birthday parties except your son the best part is he is still himself the medication doesnt make him groggy or zombie like dont know what we would have done without this drug the only side effect we noticed was that he would get little more whiney than usual in the evening when the medication was wearing off other than that we havent noticed any other side effects thank you strattera

sideEffectsReview: well was quite leary about starting seasonique was already taking yaz and loved it but periods year why pass that up from the moment started taking it it was not decreased sex drive had none at all which made the birth control completely useless to me in addition to that the acne just kept getting worse did not have acne to begin with besides the occasional blemish here and there it started getting worse on my face then my chest then my back it is not just one here or one there my back chest and chin are seriously covered have even had one on my ribs crazy my boobs no longer fit into my bras even some shirts it was like they doubled in size overnight not huge problem just annoying with no explanation went out and bought bra week later it did not even cover my boobs lastly have been fretting the last weeks because still have not gotten my period never had problem with my periods showing up in the past they have always been lighter and not very long pretty ideal actually the dr said would bleed between still not bleeding have taken pregnancy tests wasted bucks on each oh yeah have been crying for no reason at all the last month started crying over some lady did not even know at work do not recommend taking seasonique know it must be expensive although do not know how much because my dr gave me sample packs and am not going to bother refilling it also they give you coupon for off and off the next refill if they are giving that much off it must be lot it was not terrible just nothing was expected and still have no clue as to why have not gotten period yet have tried several other birth control pills and never had any side effects with any of them this is the first time tried one where only get period every three months so maybe those are way different or something if you are looking for good pill yaz worked great for me and never had any breakthrough bleeding mood swings loss of sex drive acne or anything hope this helps

commentsReview: i took fosamax for almost years and after bone density scans which showed no improvement decided to stop the treatment against my doctor advice which was to take fosamax for at least years believe that we still do not know enough about how the bone keeps itself healthy and that bone scans are not yet reliable it is big business and finally refused to keep medication that is so hard on the digestive system and can also have very dangerous side effects frozen bones believe it is called still have to be convinced that low density bone is not necessarily stronger than bone with more density waiting for more research am trying to walk as much as possible and to follow reasonable diet and to be at peace with myself thanks

benefitsReview: i was unable to go up and down steps without acute pain and unable to stand long or walk for too long without pain becoming unbearable took my first dose of mg at bedtime and woke up in morning feeling almost like new person tremendous reduction in pain and spasms of leg with greater range of motion after day or two had to increase the dosage as the knee started to stiffen up again making walking and steps difficult

benefitsReview: i feel the treatment was very helpful in keeping my skin clear looking and think somewhat tighter it also gave my face healthy color and appearance it was less dull the way aging skin can become also think it did keep some lines at bay it gave me much improved appearance have been using renova for few years and will continue to use this cream for long time to come

benefitsReview: helped me to feel better lessened anxiety panic attacks tension emotional exhaustion was able to tolerate being around people better because talking did not seem so loud once was used to the drug it helped me get out of bed and function in day to day life better falling asleep getting out of bed was serious struggle eventually with the combined therapy pretty much now feel like myself again just with less energy reserve and ability to have discipline with my routine for instance can not get up early during the am am hours and get to work on time like use to in fact am late for everything now which is out of my character can tolerate multiple loads of stress with calmness and collectivity like use to otherwise day to day life is manageble as long as obey my bodies new limitations did not gain weight or increase in appetite struggled with appetite actually and at times had to force myself to eat
sideEffectsReview: this drug gave me alot of strange sensations when turned my head left or right got this mild scratchy or whip like noise in my ears along with tingling in my head also my vision seemed to briefly black out this lasted for many months thought it was perhaps not real or just in my head my psychiatrist called it tracking and confirmed it as known side affect with paxil use did not bother to worry anymore about it this passed after some months no longer get it felt very dizzy and sleepy at times would fall asleep anywhere do not know if it was the depression the paxil lack of sleep my body trying to heal from stress sometimes felt like was living life from inside of fish bowl from sensory standpoint was chronically late to my job of years for years straight after suffering this nervous breakdown due to spousal abuse subsequently was fired when miss doses of the paxil especially or more in row feel like did when just started them can barely get out of bed and function am super sleepy feel drunk am dizzy will literally go missing for days it takes few days of regular doses to get me back into my normal mode
commentsReview: initially was only prescriped paxil and xanax took only these for few months under my pmd dose was increased from lower one to mg as my depression and anxiety symptoms were still moderately severe impairing my work performace and other quality of life withing few months was referred to psychiatrist for med mgmt after less than months wellbutrin was added to the cocktail at dose of mg then increased to mg xl once daily ambien was also presccribed as my symptoms did not allow me to fall asleep life greatly improved within the next months to year weaned off the ambien and xanax completely still take the paxil and wellbutrin at the same doses also had counseling during all of this time

benefitsReview: the benefits of tamoxifen have been to be cancer free years after my diagnosis hopefully this clean bill of health will continue as begin year of tamoxifen in my year plan the benefits of effexor help balance the mood swings caused by lowered amount of estrogen in my body tamoxifen does its job by keeping the estrogen blocked in my body so any abnormal cells can not feed on the estrogen my cancer was highly estrogen positive lowered estrogen causes depression and mood swings effexor helps to alleviate these symptoms along with my exercise regime and healthy eating habits
sideEffectsReview: side effects were more severe at the onset of taking tamoxifen had hot flashes that were quite severe they often came without warning especially at mealtime also had some body aches and pains vaginal dryness was also severe my period became erratic after years most side effects have decreased hot flashes are gone as well as the aches my period has been non existant for months however feel irritable and edgy about the regularly scheduled time for few days the effexor helps dryness is still problem but not as severe vaginal odor continues to be concern
commentsReview: i was put on tamoxifen for years following my breast cancer diagnosis started tamoxifen started zoloft months later when began having mood swings zoloft helped for year then felt my symptoms returning began effexor at mg and have been fine my oncologist felt am young and strong age exercise times weekly runner martial artist and that should try to lower or end my effexor however did not agree needed help with the mood swings and irritability can not lose my temper at work work with developmentally disabled adults losing my temper could be my job did try natural regime of vitamins and for several months but felt no relief friends even told me about my mood went from depressed to angry in flash the mg of effexor is wonderful my estrogen is blocked by the tamoxifen and the effexor helps keep me at an even keel

benefitsReview: i was diagnosed with bipolar ii disorder in february of found that my manic states led to very erratic and inconsistent behavior also found the depressive lows to be particularly difficult to manage in november was prescribed seroquel by urgent care physician immediately found its calming effects to be extremely relieving to my mania did however find it difficult to maintain functioning state due to its sedating effects then switched to seroquel xr and found much more successful experience was initially given mg seroquel xr paired with mg lexapro while initially good way to stop the mania found mg to be too much to function on decided to halve my seroquel xr dose to mg continuing to take mg of lexapro this combo has been great and am so much calmer and feel way more in control of my life do however find the sedating effects to be difficult upon awaking in the morning try to offset this by ensuring that receive full hour rest after administering dosage would highly recommend this combo to anyone that is having difficulty finding mental balance between dark and light this year of treatment has allowed me to find calm that have never quite experienced beforehand
sideEffectsReview: i found that despite the great benefits mentally the physical side effects are fair trade was about lbs when started this drug months ago today way about lbs that is definitely pound gain additionally always prided myself on my enormous amount of energy after taking this drug am extremely lethargic in the hours after taking it bedtime and the morning hours
commentsReview: i take mg of seroquel xr and mg of lexapro nightly

benefitsReview: most importantly my blood pressure went back down to normal when my heart rate rose to more normal level was then taken off the topral and my blood pressure has remained at good level additionally my hair stopped falling out and was not as dry also my skin improved before the medication my skin was horribly dry and flaky the changes did not take place overnight would say that it took about months to see any improvement in my hair and skin
sideEffectsReview: i really experienced very few side effects if any initially they started me off on very low dosage because they just thought it was simply hypothyroidism but after blood test they realized that has hashimooto is thyroidities and moointored it more closely at low dosages there was not much improvement in my symptoms do have excessive sweating but they are not sure if that is the synthroid or menopause and the doctors do not really seem concerned
commentsReview: initially was being treated for high blood pressure and put on topral but they did tsh test and realized that something was wrong with my thyroid was originally started off on very low dosage mcg daily and had to keep going back for blood work every month slowly they increased it until they did another test and found out that it was hashimoto is thyroiditis at that point they increased the dosage to mcg daily and so far it has worked out but do have to keep having the tsh levels checked

sideEffectsReview: loss of limbido my case probably is not perfect control because lost high paying job moved to another state and moved in with my girlfriend when began taking the medication within months started brand new job and encountered other new stressors can attribute some of the loss of libido to job related stress and moving in with my girlfriend of years would guess the effects on libido would be very minimal had my job and living situations remained constant am overall much happier having thicker hair than would be with consistent sex drive am able to get more work done and focus more on important life goals than being constantly distracted with sex instead of wanting sex times per week only want it twice per month now again this is probably plus
commentsReview: i started slowing losing hair when was the hair loss was unnoticeable until turned my receding hairline started to become very apparent at especially in my part line began taking propecia when turned and it appears to have regrown hair on the back and sides of my scalp and has slowed my receding hairline unfortunately it appears that am still developing minor bald spot in the middle of my scalp based on my current rate of hair loss am guessing that will maintain healthy head of hair for the next years at probably will not care how my hair looks because will be well out of the dating game do not think propecia is cure all for my particular pattern of baldness but feel it would be highly effective for others anyone who is experiencing baldness at the back of scalp would benefit greatly the receding hairline will probably continue but at much slower pace may eventually go completely bald regardless but honestly feel have saved years of youthful appearance

benefitsReview: this is an nsri different from an ssri because it works on more than one brain chemical when an ssri is ineffective or patient finds that after period of time working drug stops working and symptoms of depression return they may be advised to try an nsri this was the case with me have been treated for my depression for years and had done extremely well for periods of time on several different drugs at different times moving from one to the next as bottomed out on each celexa and lexapro being the most recent when lexapro let me down after couple of years was advised to try pristiq which was just released only few months before my doctor suggested it was extremely hesitant as did not want to go through another adjustment period of sleeplessness headaches possible weight gain sexual issues etc you know the drill if you have taken drugs for deperession so chose to stay on my lexapro and be depressed hoping that it would start working again at higher dose wrong getting to the end of my rope with my depression finally decided to bite the bullet and try the prestiq my depression disappeared within weeks leaving me feeling better than had in months began smiling again and fully functioning doing the things enjoy and had let slide my sense of well being and hopefulness for the future returned

benefitsReview: prior to starting mg acyclovir qid was taking the standard mg times day regimin devloped the shingles in the th cranial nerve had lesions following the entire nerve roots across my face but had them internally as well there were lesions in the ear canal the side of my tongue and down my throat had taken flu shot and had exposure to sun as well as starting new jobs about the same time as the first onset developed blister which thought was herpes had not had herpes outbreak in years started the acyclovir and noticed more and different complaints every day first got lesion on the entrance to the ear canal and more accompanying the first one on my lower chin then my lower teeth began to become painful as if had great toothache after about days began to feel exhausted and unable to snap out of my fatigue the next day awoke and had sensation that my mouth was not fully moving later the eye began to remain open and would not blink the rd day of these symtoms devloped total paralysis of the left face saw of my doctors immediately he gave me cortisone shot and told me the dose of acyclovir to take he said it was bell is palsey friend called and said it was ramsay hunt was on bedrest from mid october until weeks ago have very little stamina and slowly am getting more energy the latest addition to my medication arsenal was alpha lipoic acid had statrted lysine and red marine algae stopped coffe soda most meat and ate only what little cooked or made myself am pleased that most of my facial functions have returned with the exception of the eye bliking completely and slight difference in my smile take at least dose of ibuprophen every day due to neuralgia or sense of swelling in my left face

commentsReview: not sure what this section requires it is straight forward case of pain relief in response to the flu virus the symptoms and the side effects became inter twined so it was not apparent that this drug was causing reaction and worse than that continued taking it as became more and more ill this is an over the counter drug would have appreciated more information from my pharmacist have tried to tell as many people as possible about what happened after have stopped taking the treatment am left with susceptibility to asthmatic type symptoms it was also scary as instinctively knew was getting worse and became concerned something very serious was going on have never experience that type of illness before normally take time out and get well this was an eye opener

benefitsReview: went from approx migraine days month to approx migraine days month while taking topamax and erinn before adding erinn was down to approx migraine days month topamax seemed to greatly lessen the hypersensitivity of my brain to overreact to triggers such as changes in altitude barometric pressures humidity levels environmental triggers such as smoke strong smells loud noises and food triggers such as dark chocolate before topamax all of these things would cause migraines to start very easily after settling in on topamax these things did not bother me like they used to

commentsReview: one day was driving on freeway san francisco bay area and felt like was going to faint it was clear day not much traffic as it was the middle of the day and this freeway is more of country freeway than our main one pulled over to the shoulder so could compose myself felt like was having panic attack which had never had before but friends have so took deep slow breaths to calm myself when felt was alright returned to the freeway but had to pull over once more before reached home have never been in an accident nor had this feeling before so could not rationalize what was happening after it happened few more times put paper bags in my car for breathing and started using side roads where had no problems when went to my doctor told him about my anxiety and he prescribed paxil for me began taking it and it took while though was not ready to try the freeway right away but it has definitely helped am now more willing to just get on the freeway have not noticed any side effects from taking it or changes in my personality did not need it for depression or any other anxiety but freeway driving

commentsReview: after turned my skin changed it became much oilier and started having large acne lesions again around my chin this was especially true before period or when was under stress at work decided to see dermatologist as was sick of the acne started yaz which was alright as well as retin this did not seem to address the larger lesions so my dr prescribed solodyn looking back now think the side effect started in the first couple weeks just did not identify them as related to the drug thought was suffering from carpal tunnel at work and could explain why my knees hurt so much was just about to go to an orthopod when decided to investigate the solodyn more read about the joint pain and lupus like symptoms stopped the drug immediately and called my dr to get in and see her she did some bloodwork and had positive ana blood result mid positive not low this is one indicator of lupus my dermatologist was adamant that the symptoms would go away now called the office again week later as was still having strong side effects and was pretty worried got phone call back that basically said hello hypochondriac you do not have lupus then my eye pain started and my eye turned totally red went to my gp who referred me to an opthalmologist who diagnosed iritis and started weeks of drops she also referred me to rheumatologist who ran number of tests and told me she is seen minocycline drugs do this to people lot and she would never take one or have her children take one great that is my saga now dealing with another iritis flair up and lot of pain in my left knee months after stopping the drug please do not take this drug

commentsReview: i had been using the trade brand of this patch climara for several months with positive results one month my local pharmacy was out of the trade brand and offered to fill the prescription with the generic brand and because was in hurry to catch plane to go on vacation agreed thinking they had to be similar wrong to begin with the generic patch is twice the size and thickness of the trade brand do not even think of wearing tight clothes while sporting one of these laughlingly told my husband we could always use one to patch flat tire if needed but soon it was not so funny within day or two knew something was wrong but had not yet identified the problem could not stop crying about nothing in particular it seemed as if overnight my world had become very sad and depressing immediately began to gain weight despite no change in my dietary habits after finally putting two and two together ripped it off and contacted my local pharmacist to see if anyone else had complained of similar experiences after rechecking my prescription the pharmacist noticed my physician had marked no generics apparently he had good reason for this choice as this was not his usual stance on generics the pharmacist refilled my prescription with the trade brand and all was quickly back to normal usually have no problem with genereic brands but unfortunately no more generic estradiol for me

benefitsReview: virtually nil please please read on
sideEffectsReview: if you take look at the side effects the fda requires provigil manufacturer cephalon to list you will find the usual stomach aches headaches etc such side effects are so common that virtually every new prescription medication ends up listing them which is why most of us do not bother reading the side effect profile for meds however failing to look at the side effects for provigil could end up costing you your life provigil of course does list the usual side effects yes but ther is one side effect listed that is rarely included as medication side effect further even if you should happen to actually read the list of provigil is side you are not likely to know what it means the side effect is called vasodilatation and the manufacturer reported to the fda that it occurred to out of every test subjects while it happened to out of every who took the placebo what is vasodilatation vasodilatation nearly always referred to as the more recognizable vasodilation refers to the general relaxation of blood vessels phenomenon that usually ends up causing small drop in blood pressure but sometimes causes significant blood pressure drop when it is then called hypotension and if you will read on you will see why for me and potentially for out of every users of provigil it very nearly killed me after weeks on provigil with the last week having been increased from mg to mg per day awoke one morning in highly delusional state speaking of non existent farm animals wandering around the kitchen table where my wife and were seated after apparently collapsing in my bedroom was taken to er which quickly determined that was critically hypotensive low blood pressure of quickly lapsed into cardiogenic shock condition where the heart all but stops pumping blood and one of the deadliest of all medical crises even among those who are still alive upon arrival at an er to die within hours or few days those who survive likely do so as did with kidneys in acute failure and brain damage similar to what is sustained by near drowning victims who have been resuscitated by lengthy cpr session
commentsReview: my er doctor immediately paged the cardiologist on call arriving quickly he assessed my condition and determined that my only chance of survival was transport to regional heart center miles away as he awaited the ambulance he took me to my local hospital is heart catheterization lab not to put stent in but to push tiny balloon through my femoral artery to destination next to my aorta after which tiny battery powered air pump was used to inflate the balloon and keep it inflated the balloon called an intra aortic balloon pump works by temporarily filling the empty space around the heart then applying continuous gentle pressure to my aorta in an effort to keep my blood pressure from additional falling past the small amount that would otherwise kill me arriving at the heart center was unconscious and would lapse into coma for days kept alive by mechanical ventilation through tube inserted through my throat to my lungs am in the tv doctors always say when the get the insertion right

benefitsReview: i have had problems falling asleep for many years had tried various other medicines both over the counter and prescription and nothing seemed to work some did not work at all some helped me initially fall asleep but woke me up in the middle of the night and others made me tired and feeling as if were drugged the next morning then one day my dentist prescribed one ativan to take before bedtime the night before an extraction and actually fell asleep standing up this is the first sleep medication that helps me initially fall asleep sleep through the night and does not make me feel tired the next day plus it has the added benefit of helping to reduce my worry anxiety and stress that had always kept me from falling asleep before
sideEffectsReview: one of the warnings on the bottle is may cause drowsiness well that is why am taking it if you do not want to feel drowsy then ativan is probably not for you another drawback is that if it is used too often your body will get used to it and you may have to bump up your dose when first began taking ativan only needed half mg to fall asleep so would cut tablet in half only use it or times month but even at that dosage after having used it for several years now find have to take whole tablet in order for the ativan to help me sleep

benefitsReview: greatly reduced severe migraines that were occurring almost daily this drug was added as preventative medication when migraines became so dibilitating that could not function in everyday life e go to work take care of self and family etc migraines were reduced after approximately weeks on the medication to about per month and then continually reduced to every to months as stayed on the medication also use the medication to manage my mood disorder bi polar disorder and was able to not have to take mood stabalizer because this drug also manages to keep me from getting manic so it is an extra bonus on top of the migraine management
sideEffectsReview: the only side effect noticed was some weight loss in the beginning my doctor was very careful to start me out on mg and move me up very slowly to the mg x per day which understand is very high dosage and took all of years to get to that dosage was monitored every days to ensure that was not losing too much weight having any type of eye problems or numbness in my hands or feet the eye problems and numbness never experienced but was always told that if did experience even hint of these things that would have to stop the medication immediately so my doctor does constantly ask me about those things have also read that topamax has been used to treat alcoholics and have noticed that since taking it have no desire to drink alcohol at all but am not an alcoholic just unique observation it really just seems like great drug
commentsReview: i am still taking it to manage both my migraines and my mood disorder mg x per day take in the am and in the pm it is prescribed by my neurologist and managed by him mostly and my psychatrist also works with him because if ever go off of the drug would be required to go onto mood stabalizer due to the bi polar disorder would be very unhappy to have to go back onto something like depakote because that made me very slow and sluggish and topamax does not have that side effect

benefitsReview: none
sideEffectsReview: drug induced psychosis resulting in day commitment to mental institution
commentsReview: many people know now work as health care professional erroneously believe that valium xanax ativan and other benzodiazepines must be used as directed and have enhanced benefit if built up in the brain ie in ways similar to ssri is effect on the brain over time was entirely aware that diazepam is prn medication and chose to use the prescribed dosage on one particular day hoping it would carry me through difficult situation unfortunately suffered paradoxical reaction which cost me dearly in many tragic ways was in state of severe psychosis for days because my benzo level was low when admitted to the hospital was given diazepam for an additional two days whereupon apparently refused to take any medication at all and recovered as detoxed have absolutely no memory of five days of my life have done research into this phenomenon and must warn all that this seems to occur most often in indiviguals with dopamine gaba reuptake variants such as those with adhd parkinsons and also ptsd diazepam is bandaid and offers no long term therapeutic benefit whatsoever in fact rebound anxiety and profound depression are common what is most ironic is that in the medical setting this occurs often after administration of versed is recognized quickly and fluzanimine is given as an antidote outside of this scenario the patient is blamed treated as suspected drug addict and stigmatized

benefitsReview: diminished extreme highs lows decreased anxiety panic attacks diminished urges to self multilate felt absolutely compelled to punch my legs arms and head at times of anxiety attacks way to numb pain of anxiety inside mental clarity felt sense of control over eating behaviors felt had choice to binge purge or not this drug was miracle as admitted myself to the er after feeling all loss of control over my extreme mood swings very happy joyfull to no reason to live the next minute my bulimia self mutilation anxiety felt as if was on very thin thread of life was ready to quit seeking any sign of serenity until was given hope with lamictal was able to hold on to life with promise that soon the medications will start working mental health issues run deep in my father is family have always been hesitant to solve my problems with meds trying virtually every alternative medicine even hypnotherapy wish would have looked into this earlier knowing that my problems had deep genetic roots chemical imbalace
sideEffectsReview: made me little sleepy which actually helped my sleeping problems as well might have affected the ease to reach orgasm however think lexapro was the main culprit of that side effect having taken that med previously lexapro has also helped my bulmia depression

commentsReview: it was catch where would feel extremely anxious ans hungry when would have my dose but if did not id feel even worse where could not sleep and feel extremely aggitated and distressed recently come off of it which involved an admission to psyc ward and was weened off in ten days which was way to quick it was horrible but iv been mentally much better for the past years and was sick of all the side effects getting off it after all these years was very hard and im currently taking diazapam temporarily until the withdrawls ease my goal is to have natural sleeps its very hard to get off but now feel that am well enough it will be very worth the result needed it at the time was prescibed it but hated taking it the whole time it is very strong drug and should be used with much caution

benefitsReview: i could see dramatic difference in my mood within weeks felt interested in all my hobbies again plus was smiling and laughing more my doctor told me could be the poster child for paxil this drug made remarkable improvement in my mild depressive state recently wks ago underwent gastric bypass surgery the doctor that performed this surgery told me not to quit taking paxil it would be like losing my best friend have had absolutely no depression after my surgery which understand is not common this drug is amazing

benefitsReview: smoother skin with no pimples present lessening of fine lines more even and radiant skin tone
sideEffectsReview: slight peeling and redness when treatment began
commentsReview: i began taking retin because my skin was having breakouts at very frequent rate began by washing my face with mild ceanser alternated between dove senstive skin and cetaphil the face must be washed gently with no manipulation scrubbing or washcloth after this rinse with warm water to make sure all soap residue is gone then lightly pat my face dry with the softest towel can find let the face air dry for minutes then pea size amount of retin can be applied to the face this little amount is for the whole face once the whole face is covered with the retin let it sink in for minutes then apply moisturizer like to use cetaphil cream for this or moisturel remember that retin should only be used at night you must wear an spf sunscreen during the day as it makes the skin sensitive

benefitsReview: increased my estrogen levels started ovulating again and after about months my ovulation formed predictable pattern with an ending menstrual period it was an easy small sized capsule to swallow and did not break down in water once ovulation was kicked off and preganancy still did not occur it allowed my obstetrician to focus on other possible problems
sideEffectsReview: initially there were no problems but after week or so began to suffer from blurred vision which would appear and disappear at random hot flushes would also be sporadic also had sense of scatterbrain ie my mind felt jumbled up could not make quick decisions everything seemed blurry in my head my stomach suffered from bloating and sense of squirmishness on some days vomitted over time this decreased and eventually after and years these symptons stopped the time line probably could be reduced but on ocassions of sickness stopped taking clomid and began the next month my skin had positive impact it was very clear and had very soft feel texture had very heightened sense of smell as well
commentsReview: after first successful pregnancy my attempts at second were not succeeding medical tests showed my ovulation hormones were very low and my period was very erratic and sometimes non existant this coincides with my history of polycistic ovariaries dosage of clomid was initiated with the aim of increasing hormones to correct levels produsing measurable ovulation and resulting regular menstrual periods clomid caused some quite uncomfortable side effects initially ie dizziness vomitting unclear mental thoughts and stomach sensitivity which onoccassons sent me to bed for recovery over time as my body absorbed clomid and adjusted to the hew level of hormones the side effects stopped whilst not inducing pregancy it allowed my obstercian to focus on other possible problems overall clomid did exactly what it is designed to do stimulate ovulation would recommend its use
